title: New polls say Trump leading Harris in every swing state amid shock Iowa finding in US election
content: Daily Beast report said after the shock poll, betting markets tilted towards Kamala Harris. Kalshi's betting market on Saturday gave Trump a 55 per cent chance of winning on Saturday but on Sunday morning that fell to 50 per cent. On Polymark, Trump was at 63 per cent on Saturday but on Sunday morning, he tumbled down to 56 per cent. PredictIt gave Harris breathing room after the Iowa poll.
summary: Daily Beast report said after the shock poll, betting markets tilted towards Kamala Harris. Kalshi's betting market on Saturday gave Trump a 55 per cent chance of winning on Saturday but on Sunday morning that fell to 50 per cent. On Polymark, Trump was at 63 per cent on Saturday but on Sunday morning, he tumbled down to 56 per cent. PredictIt gave Harris breathing room after the Iowa poll.

title: Pittsburgh 'Hamas operative' arrested for vandalising Jewish buildings; donations to Squad Democrats revealed
content: FBI and Pittsburgh police arrested two locals for hate crimes, involving vandalism on Jewish buildings. Mohamad Hamad, a member of the Pennsylvania Air National Guard, tested explosives and claimed to be a Hamas operative. Talya Lubit, his accomplice, assisted in the pro-Hamas graffiti on Jewish facilities.
summary: FBI and Pittsburgh police arrested two locals for hate crimes, involving vandalism on Jewish buildings. Mohamad Hamad, a member of the Pennsylvania Air National Guard, tested explosives and claimed to be a Hamas operative. Talya Lubit, his accomplice, assisted in the pro-Hamas graffiti on Jewish facilities.

title: MAGA supporters furious that SNL ripped off Trump's 2015 skit: 'Is there anything she won’t copy?'
content: In the 2015 show, Jimmy Fallon portrayed Trump and the two Trumps discussed preparation for the then-second Republican Primary Debate, creating jobs, immigration, taxes etc. “Kamala ripped off the same bit Trump did when he was on Saturday Night Live in 2015 …and Trump’s was double the length,” radio host Ari Hoffman said on X.
summary: In the 2015 show, Jimmy Fallon portrayed Trump and the two Trumps discussed preparation for the then-second Republican Primary Debate, creating jobs, immigration, taxes etc. “Kamala ripped off the same bit Trump did when he was on Saturday Night Live in 2015 …and Trump’s was double the length,” radio host Ari Hoffman said on X.

title: Severe storms ravage Oklahoma: 6 injured, several homes damaged; thousands without power
content: Intense storms and tornadoes hit Oklahoma early Sunday, causing extensive damage and leaving around 86,000 without electricity. Officials reported several injuries and significant property damage, including flipped vehicles and damaged roofs. Emergency shelters were set up for affected residents. The city remained at risk for further heavy rainfall and thunderstorms.
summary: Intense storms and tornadoes hit Oklahoma early Sunday, causing extensive damage and leaving around 86,000 without electricity. Officials reported several injuries and significant property damage, including flipped vehicles and damaged roofs. Emergency shelters were set up for affected residents. The city remained at risk for further heavy rainfall and thunderstorms.

title: How Kamala Harris’ campaign redefined Hilary Clinton’s playbook against Donald Trump
content: Kamala Harris's presidential campaign diverges from Hillary Clinton's by emphasizing pragmatic policies over breaking gender barriers. Harris focuses on her record and specific issues like immigration reform, avoiding direct clashes with Trump and underplaying her historic candidacy, while grassroots supporters highlight her identity.
summary: Kamala Harris's presidential campaign diverges from Hillary Clinton's by emphasizing pragmatic policies over breaking gender barriers. Harris focuses on her record and specific issues like immigration reform, avoiding direct clashes with Trump and underplaying her historic candidacy, while grassroots supporters highlight her identity.

title: Poll Nostradamus Allan Lichtman vs Nate Silver: Who predicts US election 2024 accurately?
content: Allan Lichtman is a historian and predicted the past nine out of 10 elections correctly except the race between George W Bush and Al Gore. Nate Silver is a statistician and his model gained popularity after he rightly predicted the result in 49 states out of 50 in 2008. Their methods are different and while Lichtman's prediction is a Kamala Harris victory, Nate Silver said his gut feeling is Donald Trump would win.
summary: Allan Lichtman is a historian and predicted the past nine out of 10 elections correctly except the race between George W Bush and Al Gore. Nate Silver is a statistician and his model gained popularity after he rightly predicted the result in 49 states out of 50 in 2008. Their methods are different and while Lichtman's prediction is a Kamala Harris victory, Nate Silver said his gut feeling is Donald Trump would win.

title: Epstein claimed Trump cuckolded his best friends, slept with Melania first on 'Lolita Express'
content: In the recordings, Epstein called Trump "charming" and "always fun" but he alleged Trump was a serial cheat in his marriages and loved to "f*** the wives of his best friends". Trump had many friends but at heart, he was a friendless man, Epstein said. He also alleged that Trump had had a scalp reduction surgery for baldness.
summary: In the recordings, Epstein called Trump "charming" and "always fun" but he alleged Trump was a serial cheat in his marriages and loved to "f*** the wives of his best friends". Trump had many friends but at heart, he was a friendless man, Epstein said. He also alleged that Trump had had a scalp reduction surgery for baldness.

title: Trump says if Kamala wins 'you are 3 days away from Great Depression'
content: During a rally in North Carolina, Donald Trump claimed that a Kamala Harris victory would lead to a Great Depression, while his win would ensure economic prosperity. Trump criticized Harris as weak, mocked her refusal to appear on Joe Rogan's podcast. “She will get overwhelmed, meltdown, and millions of people will die, perhaps. This is not a charity event. This is an election for the biggest and toughest job anywhere in the world.”
summary: During a rally in North Carolina, Donald Trump claimed that a Kamala Harris victory would lead to a Great Depression, while his win would ensure economic prosperity. Trump criticized Harris as weak, mocked her refusal to appear on Joe Rogan's podcast. “She will get overwhelmed, meltdown, and millions of people will die, perhaps. This is not a charity event. This is an election for the biggest and toughest job anywhere in the world.”

title: Nate Silver reacts to shocking Iowa poll: 'Somebody is going to be wrong'
content: Trump won Iowa both in 2016 and 2020 making Iowa a ruby-red state. But the nationally recognized poll shows Kamala Harris has picked up support from Iowa women -- probably on the abortion issue. Robert F Kennedy Jr who abandoned his independent presidential campaign will remain on the Iowa ballot and he got three per cent of the vote which is down from six per cent in September and nine per cent in June.
summary: Trump won Iowa both in 2016 and 2020 making Iowa a ruby-red state. But the nationally recognized poll shows Kamala Harris has picked up support from Iowa women -- probably on the abortion issue. Robert F Kennedy Jr who abandoned his independent presidential campaign will remain on the Iowa ballot and he got three per cent of the vote which is down from six per cent in September and nine per cent in June.

title: 'If Peanut was an illegal immigrant raping women...': MAGA social media explodes against New York officials
content: Mark Longo, a wildlife enthusiast and self-taught rehabilitator, had amassed a large online following by sharing content about his animal sanctuary, P'Nuts Freedom Farm, where Peanut was a prominent fixture. Peanut, an affectionate and playful squirrel, was first rescued by Longo after he witnessed Peanut’s mother die in a car accident. Peanut quickly became a beloved personality, not only in Longo’s home but also on social media, where fans connected deeply with his story of survival and his relationship with Longo. However, the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC), alongside the county health department, received reports alleging that Longo was illegally keeping wild animals as pets and housing them in conditions that posed potential risks for rabies.
summary: Mark Longo, a wildlife enthusiast and self-taught rehabilitator, had amassed a large online following by sharing content about his animal sanctuary, P'Nuts Freedom Farm, where Peanut was a prominent fixture. Peanut, an affectionate and playful squirrel, was first rescued by Longo after he witnessed Peanut’s mother die in a car accident. Peanut quickly became a beloved personality, not only in Longo’s home but also on social media, where fans connected deeply with his story of survival and his relationship with Longo. However, the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation (DEC), alongside the county health department, received reports alleging that Longo was illegally keeping wild animals as pets and housing them in conditions that posed potential risks for rabies.

title: Trick or steal: Women caught on camera stealing Halloween candies, decorations in Canada
content: In Markham, Ontario, a woman was caught on camera stealing Halloween candy meant for children, quickly going viral and sparking outrage on social media. Harrison Faulkner shared the footage, which has garnered significant views. In a similar incident, American musician Cody Tate posted about adults taking candy intended for kids from outside his home.
summary: In Markham, Ontario, a woman was caught on camera stealing Halloween candy meant for children, quickly going viral and sparking outrage on social media. Harrison Faulkner shared the footage, which has garnered significant views. In a similar incident, American musician Cody Tate posted about adults taking candy intended for kids from outside his home.

title: Why did New York officials euthanize Peanut the Squirrel? Here's what happened
content: New York officials seized and euthanized a pet squirrel named Peanut, causing outrage and support for owner Mark Longo. Peanut was a social media sensation and symbol for Longo's animal sanctuary. Authorities cited concerns about rabies, with Peanut allegedly biting an officer. The incident sparked online backlash from public figures, including Elon Musk.
summary: New York officials seized and euthanized a pet squirrel named Peanut, causing outrage and support for owner Mark Longo. Peanut was a social media sensation and symbol for Longo's animal sanctuary. Authorities cited concerns about rabies, with Peanut allegedly biting an officer. The incident sparked online backlash from public figures, including Elon Musk.

title: 'Special moments': Justin Trudeau visits temples in Canada to celebrate Diwali
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau shared glimpses from Diwali celebrations with the community, visiting temples and engaging in festivities. He highlighted the festival's message of light over darkness. This comes amid rising tensions between Canada and India, following accusations related to the killing of Hardeep Singh Nijjar.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau shared glimpses from Diwali celebrations with the community, visiting temples and engaging in festivities. He highlighted the festival's message of light over darkness. This comes amid rising tensions between Canada and India, following accusations related to the killing of Hardeep Singh Nijjar.

title: 'Keep Kamala and carry-on-la': Harris makes hilarious appearance on 'Saturday Night Live'; watch video
content: Kamala Harris made a surprise comedic appearance on 'Saturday Night Live' alongside Maya Rudolph, who portrayed her. In their exchange, they humorously discussed shared experiences and took jabs at Donald Trump. The duo, dressed identically, urged supporters to continue backing Harris while ending the segment with the classic 'SNL' sign-off.
summary: Kamala Harris made a surprise comedic appearance on 'Saturday Night Live' alongside Maya Rudolph, who portrayed her. In their exchange, they humorously discussed shared experiences and took jabs at Donald Trump. The duo, dressed identically, urged supporters to continue backing Harris while ending the segment with the classic 'SNL' sign-off.

title: 'Treated me like terrorist, drug dealer': Euthanised squirrel Peanut's owner says his house was ransacked for five hours
content: Mark Longo, owner of a pet squirrel named Peanut, reports a five-hour raid on his home by government agents, seizing his pets. Officials claim Peanut bit someone and must be tested for rabies, but Longo denies it, seeking further investigation. Peanut's rescue story and widespread social media fame highlight his significance to Longo's animal rescue organization.
summary: Mark Longo, owner of a pet squirrel named Peanut, reports a five-hour raid on his home by government agents, seizing his pets. Officials claim Peanut bit someone and must be tested for rabies, but Longo denies it, seeking further investigation. Peanut's rescue story and widespread social media fame highlight his significance to Longo's animal rescue organization.

title: Women of America v Donald Trump: Liberals triggered by MAGA leader's 'execution fantasy'
content: Arizona attorney general Kris Mayes is investigating whether Donald Trump's comments about Liz Cheney constitute a death threat. The controversial remarks have sparked significant outrage among Democratic women, with Kamala Harris condemning such rhetoric.
summary: Arizona attorney general Kris Mayes is investigating whether Donald Trump's comments about Liz Cheney constitute a death threat. The controversial remarks have sparked significant outrage among Democratic women, with Kamala Harris condemning such rhetoric.

title: ‘Made me who I am today’: Kamala Harris draws strength from mother's journey from India
content: Kamala Harris paid tribute to her mother, Dr Shyamala Gopalan Harris, an Indian immigrant who profoundly influenced her life and career. Harris reflected on her upbringing, her commitment to healthcare equity, her vision for immigration reform, and her foreign policy stance, contrasting it with her opponent's.
summary: Kamala Harris paid tribute to her mother, Dr Shyamala Gopalan Harris, an Indian immigrant who profoundly influenced her life and career. Harris reflected on her upbringing, her commitment to healthcare equity, her vision for immigration reform, and her foreign policy stance, contrasting it with her opponent's.

title: Dhaka-Washington ties won't be impacted by US polls: Yunus govt
Bar & grill chain TGI Fridays files for bankruptcy
content: Casual dining chain TGI Fridays has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas. Its 39 company-owned US restaurants will stay open during the restructuring, while 56 US franchise locations and those in 40 other countries are unaffected. The pandemic and capital structure issues are cited as primary reasons for the filing.
summary: Casual dining chain TGI Fridays has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy in Texas. Its 39 company-owned US restaurants will stay open during the restructuring, while 56 US franchise locations and those in 40 other countries are unaffected. The pandemic and capital structure issues are cited as primary reasons for the filing.

title: Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' prevails in copyright appeal over 'Let's Get It On'
content: A federal appeals court ruled that Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' did not violate the copyright of Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On.' The court found that only the skeletal sheet music of 'Let's Get It On' was protected, rejecting claims about the song's chord pattern originality.
summary: A federal appeals court ruled that Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' did not violate the copyright of Marvin Gaye's 'Let's Get It On.' The court found that only the skeletal sheet music of 'Let's Get It On' was protected, rejecting claims about the song's chord pattern originality.
